Features
Edges (11 points): Arcane Hand; Block; Combat Reflexes; Dungeon Crawler; Elite Huscarl Of Hammerhand; Huscarl Of Hammerhand; One Of Thirteen; Ranger; Siege Engineer; Watcher Of The Black Gate; Woodsman Hindrances: Big Mouth; Illiterate; Stubborn; Vow Frost Dwarf Features: Heat Lethargy; Insular; Low Light Vision; Mountain-Born; Slow; Tough; Winter Soul
Feature Notes:
Big Mouth: Cannot keep secrets
Heat Lethargy: Suffers -1 Trait rolls at temperatures above 52F
Illiterate: Cannot read or write
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Stubborn: Never admits error
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 8 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d6
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: None Weapons: Crossbow (2d6 R15" AP 2); Lance (d8+d8 AP 2); Throwing Axe (d8+d6 R3"); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Block: +1 Parry
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Slow: -1 Pace
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcane Hand: May interrupt foe spellcasting (+2 if on Hold)
Combat Reflexes: +2 on Shaken recovery rolls
Elite Huscarl Of Hammerhand: May throw a warhammer to strike all in a 1" line
Huscarl Of Hammerhand: Warhammer has range 2/Thrown axes and hammers may strike multiple targets
Mountain-Born: Suffers no difficult terrain penalty in hills and mountains
One Of Thirteen: May use an adjacent ally's combat edge 1/rd
Siege Engineer: Siege weapons gain +50% range and +2 AP
Watcher Of The Black Gate: +2 vs. demon powers
Winter Soul: +2 Armor vs. cold attacks
